context_of_use: The user wants to update their profile information to ensure account details are accurate.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: To maintain accurate account details.
description: Modify user account details such as name, contact information, and preferences.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
postconditions: User profile information is updated successfully.
User receives confirmation of the update.
assumptions: User has access to the profile update feature.
User understands how to navigate to the profile update section.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
The system shall provide confirmation of successful updates.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of profile information that can be updated.
main_flow: 1. User selects the option to update profile → System displays the profile update form.
2. User enters new profile information → System validates the input.
3. User submits the updated profile information → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is invalid, the system displays an error message and prompts the user to correct the input.
